message.content:
The basic salary in India varies greatly depending on the industry, work experience, job position, and level of expertise. As of January 2021:

Entry-level professionals (0-3 years experience) can expect a monthly average salary ranging from INR 10,000 to INR 30,000.

Mid-level professionals (~5+ years experience) could earn between INR 25,000 to INR 50,000 per month or more.

Senior-level professionals with considerable expertise and work experience could earn over INR 60k -100k or much higher.

It's important to note that these figures represent general trends; actual salaries might be lower/higher. In industries like IT/software development or finance where demand for skilled employees is high-paying jobs tend to offer well-above-average wages compared to other sectors.
